definition: Providing temporary support structures that are gradually removed as learner competence increases

positive_examples: I'll do the first step for you, then we'll do the next one together.
At first I provided sentence starters; now she writes independently.
Gradually fading support as the student becomes more capable.
Training wheels that come off once balance is achieved.
negative_examples: Here's the problem - figure it out yourself.
I'll just do it for you since you're struggling.
The same level of support was provided regardless of progress.
training_hints.disambiguation: Temporary support that fades, not permanent help or abandonment
